column1: The celebration of her funeral Mass will be held at 11 a.m. Monday
column5: LaGrange with burial in Calvary Cemetery. Visitation will be from 4-8 p.m. Sunday at Ratterman and Sons
column6: 3800 Bardstown Road where the Rite of Remembrance Service will be held at 7 p.m. Visitation will also begin at 10 a.m. Monday prior to the Mass at the church.
